Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: This endpoint returns by default the next non-expired football predictions. URL parameters can be specified to show specific date in the past or future or to filter by federation and prediction market name.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves football match predictions for upcoming matches by default. Supports filtering by date range (past or future), federation, and prediction market name. Returns an array of prediction objects containing match details, predicted outcomes, and confidence metrics. Non-expired predictions are returned by default.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple prediction sources are returned and added context about response contents for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Returns all predictions available for a match id.
data.summary_suggestion: Get all predictions for a specific match
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available predictions for a specific football match identified by its match ID. Returns an array of prediction objects from different prediction markets and models, including predicted outcomes, confidence scores, and market-specific details. Useful for comparing multiple prediction models for a single match.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple prediction sources are returned and added context about response contents for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/performance-stats' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are aggregated or per-model stats, and doesn't explain the response structure. Added clarity on metric types, time window structure, and use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Returns predictions accuracy in the last 1, 7, 14, 30 days.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves accuracy and performance metrics for the prediction models across multiple time windows: last 1, 7, 14, and 30 days. Returns statistics including accuracy rates, win/loss ratios, and other performance indicators for each time period. Useful for evaluating model reliability and historical performance trends.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are aggregated or per-model stats, and doesn't explain the response structure. Added clarity on metric types, time window structure, and use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/list-federations' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure (what fields are in each federation object) and doesn't explain the operation's purpose in the context of the API workflow. Added response structure details and use case context for AI agents.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all the available federations.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all available football federations supported by the API. Returns an array of federation objects containing federation identifiers and names. Use this to populate federation filter options or validate federation parameters for other API calls.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure (what fields are in each federation object) and doesn't explain the operation's purpose in the context of the API workflow. Added response structure details and use case context for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/list-markets' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure and doesn't explain what constitutes a 'market' in the football prediction domain. Added examples of market types and clarified the response structure to help AI agents understand available options and when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all the supported prediction markets
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all supported prediction markets available through the API. Returns an array of market objects containing market identifiers and names (e.g., match winner, over/under, handicap). Use this to populate market filter options or validate market parameters for prediction queries.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure and doesn't explain what constitutes a 'market' in the football prediction domain. Added examples of market types and clarified the response structure to help AI agents understand available options and when to use this operation.

Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: This endpoint returns by default the next non-expired football predictions. URL parameters can be specified to show specific date in the past or future or to filter by federation and prediction market name.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves football match predictions for upcoming matches by default. Supports filtering by date range (past or future), federation, and prediction market name. Returns an array of prediction objects containing match details, predicted outcomes, and confidence metrics. Non-expired predictions are returned by default.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple prediction sources are returned and added context about response contents for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Returns all predictions available for a match id.
data.summary_suggestion: Get all predictions for a specific match
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available predictions for a specific football match identified by its match ID. Returns an array of prediction objects from different prediction markets and models, including predicted outcomes, confidence scores, and market-specific details. Useful for comparing multiple prediction models for a single match.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple prediction sources are returned and added context about response contents for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/performance-stats' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are aggregated or per-model stats, and doesn't explain the response structure. Added clarity on metric types, time window structure, and use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Returns predictions accuracy in the last 1, 7, 14, 30 days.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves accuracy and performance metrics for the prediction models across multiple time windows: last 1, 7, 14, and 30 days. Returns statistics including accuracy rates, win/loss ratios, and other performance indicators for each time period. Useful for evaluating model reliability and historical performance trends.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are aggregated or per-model stats, and doesn't explain the response structure. Added clarity on metric types, time window structure, and use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/list-federations' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure (what fields are in each federation object) and doesn't explain the operation's purpose in the context of the API workflow. Added response structure details and use case context for AI agents.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all the available federations.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all available football federations supported by the API. Returns an array of federation objects containing federation identifiers and names. Use this to populate federation filter options or validate federation parameters for other API calls.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure (what fields are in each federation object) and doesn't explain the operation's purpose in the context of the API workflow. Added response structure details and use case context for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/list-markets' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure and doesn't explain what constitutes a 'market' in the football prediction domain. Added examples of market types and clarified the response structure to help AI agents understand available options and when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all the supported prediction markets
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all supported prediction markets available through the API. Returns an array of market objects containing market identifiers and names (e.g., match winner, over/under, handicap). Use this to populate market filter options or validate market parameters for prediction queries.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure and doesn't explain what constitutes a 'market' in the football prediction domain. Added examples of market types and clarified the response structure to help AI agents understand available options and when to use this operation.

Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: This endpoint returns by default the next non-expired football predictions. URL parameters can be specified to show specific date in the past or future or to filter by federation and prediction market name.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves football match predictions for upcoming matches by default. Supports filtering by date range (past or future), federation, and prediction market name. Returns an array of prediction objects containing match details, predicted outcomes, and confidence metrics. Non-expired predictions are returned by default.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on what parameters are available, what the response contains, and the default behavior. Added specific parameter context, return value details, and clarified the non-expired default behavior for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/predictions/{id}' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple prediction sources are returned and added context about response contents for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Returns all predictions available for a match id.
data.summary_suggestion: Get all predictions for a specific match
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all available predictions for a specific football match identified by its match ID. Returns an array of prediction objects from different prediction markets and models, including predicted outcomes, confidence scores, and market-specific details. Useful for comparing multiple prediction models for a single match.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain what 'all predictions' means (multiple models/markets), what the response structure contains, or the use case. Enhanced to clarify that multiple prediction sources are returned and added context about response contents for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/performance-stats' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are aggregated or per-model stats, and doesn't explain the response structure. Added clarity on metric types, time window structure, and use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Returns predictions accuracy in the last 1, 7, 14, 30 days.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves accuracy and performance metrics for the prediction models across multiple time windows: last 1, 7, 14, and 30 days. Returns statistics including accuracy rates, win/loss ratios, and other performance indicators for each time period. Useful for evaluating model reliability and historical performance trends.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is incomplete - doesn't specify what metrics are included beyond 'accuracy', doesn't clarify if these are aggregated or per-model stats, and doesn't explain the response structure. Added clarity on metric types, time window structure, and use case for AI agents to understand when to call this operation.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all the available federations.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all available football federations supported by the API. Returns an array of federation objects containing federation identifiers and names. Use this to populate federation filter options or validate federation parameters for other API calls.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure (what fields are in each federation object) and doesn't explain the operation's purpose in the context of the API workflow. Added response structure details and use case context for AI agents.

message: Operation 'get_/api/v2/list-markets' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about response structure and doesn't explain what constitutes a 'market' in the football prediction domain. Added examples of market types and clarified the response structure to help AI agents understand available options and when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Returns an array of all the supported prediction markets
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a complete list of all supported prediction markets available through the API. Returns an array of market objects containing market identifiers and names (e.g., match winner, over/under, handicap). Use this to populate market filter options or validate market parameters for prediction queries.
